categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Spitter" was the nickname of a clone cold assault trooper who served in the Grand Army of the Republic during the Clone Wars.

Around 22 BBY, Spitter served under the command of Jedi Generals Plo Koon and Kit Fisto during the Battle of Khorm where they take action against the Confederacy of Independent Systems. When Fisto and Koon withdrew to destroy the Separatist weather-control station, Spitter remained with General Tauht in a Republic camp until they were later ambushed by Battle droids under the command of Dark Acolyte Asajj Ventress. Surviving the attack, Spitter, along with Comet, Wolffe and Major Kendal Ozzel, were captured and taken to a Separatist base that was controlled by the Khormai warlord Unger Gout. Later, they were able to break free and escape in an Armored Assault Tank.
